lead_paragraph: SPIEGEL--Richard (Dick), gasoline distributor passed away on Tuesday. He is loved by his wife Rhoda, his children Robert (Jill), Jeffrey (Meredith) and Jodi, son-in-law Barry, as well as eight adoring grandchildren. The funeral will be held at Boulevard Riverside Chapel, 1450 Broadway, Hewlett, NY on Thursday at 11:30. 1/3
